Class.ClassComment:
ConflictResolver /** * Strategy for resolving conflicts amongst multiple rules.

Since a fact or set of facts may activate multiple rules, a ConflictResolutionStrategy is used to provide priority ordering of conflicting rules.

* @see Activation * @see Tuple * @see org.kie.rule.Rule * @version $Id: ConflictResolver.java,v 1.1 2005/07/26 01:06:32 mproctor Exp $ */
